meta.description: A fully local text diff comparison tool. Compare safely in your browser without sending data to any server.
meta.og.title: utsushi - Text Diff Tool
meta.og.description: Compare multiple texts in your browser. Fully local processing for privacy protection.

footer.privacy.noSend: Input content is not sent to any server
privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.section1.title: 1. Introduction
privacy.section1.content: utsushi (hereinafter "this tool") is a tool for comparing text differences in your browser. This privacy policy explains how information is handled in this tool.
privacy.section2.title: 2. Handling of Text Data
privacy.section2.intro.prefix: Text data entered into this tool is
privacy.section2.intro.emphasis: processed entirely locally within your browser
privacy.section2.item1: Input content is not sent to any server
privacy.section2.item2: Input content is not saved or recorded
privacy.section2.item3: Input data is deleted when you close the page
privacy.section3.title: 3. About Analytics
privacy.section3.intro: This tool uses the following analytics tools for service improvement.
privacy.section3.ga.label: Google Analytics
privacy.section3.ga.body: Collects statistical information such as visitor count, page views, and device usage
privacy.section3.clarity.label: Microsoft Clarity
privacy.section3.clarity.body: Collects anonymized user interaction patterns (clicks, scrolls, etc.)
privacy.section3.note.prefix: These tools may use cookies, but
privacy.section3.note.emphasis: the content of your text input is never collected
privacy.section3.notice.title: ⚠️ About Microsoft Clarity Session Recording
privacy.section3.notice.content1: Microsoft Clarity has a feature that records user interactions. While we have configured input areas to be masked, we cannot guarantee complete exclusion due to technical limitations.
privacy.section3.notice.content2: If you handle sensitive text, consider blocking third-party cookies in your browser settings or enabling Do Not Track (DNT).
privacy.section4.title: 4. About Cookies
privacy.section4.intro: This tool uses cookies or local storage for the following purposes.
privacy.section5.title: 5. Third-Party Disclosure
privacy.section5.content: Since this tool does not collect input data, no disclosure to third parties is made. Statistical information collected through analytics is handled according to each analytics service's privacy policy.
privacy.section6.title: 6. Contact
privacy.section6.content: For inquiries about this privacy policy, please use GitHub Issues.
privacy.section7.title: 7. Amendments
privacy.section7.content: This privacy policy may be amended as necessary. Significant changes will be announced on this tool.
toast.error.single: At least 2 texts are required for comparison
